lines.i: This class corresponds to a document section intended to contain the alerts, allergies, and adverse reactions. This class provides context required for behavioral health interoperability.

ol.li: Contains zero or more [0..*] suicideAlert, where its type is Suicide Risk
Contains zero or one [0..1] violentBehaviorRisk, where its type is Violent Behavior Risk
Contains zero or more [0..*] suicideAlert, where its type is Suicide Risk
Contains zero or one [0..1] violentBehaviorRisk, where its type is Violent Behavior Risk
